list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a portable means of illumination such as a piece of wood or cloth soaked in tallow or an oil lamp on a pole, sometimes carried ceremonially.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the shops had been looted and torched
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các cửa hàng đã bị cướp phá và bị bỏ rơi
